original: @329b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @329b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya aa pa ri mi ta gu na aa nu shim s'a n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
analyzed: a'arya aa pa ri mi ta gu na aa nu shim s'a n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
translated: Ārya-apramitaguṇānuśaṃsā-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /🔽dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Ārya-apramitaguṇānuśaṃsā-nāma-dhāraṇī🔽Homage to the Three Jewels!🔽Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: na mo bha ga wa te /
analyzed: na mo bha ga wa te /
translated: Homage to the Blessed One,

original: aa mi ta bh'aya /🔽ta th'a ga ta ya /
analyzed: aa mi ta bh'aya / ta th'a ga ta ya /
translated: the Buddha Amitābha,

original: aarha te samyaksam bhuddh'a ya /
analyzed: aarha te samyaksam bhuddh'a ya /
translated: the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One.

original: tadya th'a / aom aa mri te /🔽aa mri tod bha be /🔽aa mri ta sambha be /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom aa mri te / aa mri tod bha be / aa mri ta sambha be /
translated: Thus: Oṃ amṛte,🔽amṛtodbhave,🔽amṛta-saṃbhave,

original: aa mri ta bi krante /
analyzed: aa mri ta bi krante /
translated: amṛta-vikrante,

original: aa mri ta ga mi ni /
analyzed: aa mri ta ga mi ni /
translated: amṛta-gamini,

original: ga ga na /
analyzed: ga ga na /
translated: gagana,

original: ga ri ti ka re /
analyzed: ga ri ti ka re /
translated: garati kare,

original: sarba kle sha ksha yam ka ri sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba kle sha ksha yam ka ri sv'ah'a /
translated: sarva-kleśa-kṣayam kari svāhā.

original: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni /
translated: The ritual of this dhāraṇī

original: 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di yin te /
translated: is as follows:

original: lan gcig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting it once, karmic obscurations accumulated over a hundred thousand eons will be purified.

original: nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: If one recites it three times a day,

original: sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: all misdeeds will be purified.

original: sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will obtain the roots of virtue generated by a thousand buddhas.

original: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: If one recites it twenty-one times,

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will purify the four root downfalls.

original: lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: If one recites it one hundred thousand times,

original: 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will see the noble Maitreya.

original: lan gnyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: lan gnyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: If one recites it two hundred thousand times,

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will see the noble Avalokiteśvara.

original: lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa 'od @330a *//
analyzed: lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od @330a *//
translated: If one recites it three hundred thousand times,

original: dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will see the Tathāgata Amitābha.

original: phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no //
translated: Even though there are immeasurable other benefits, they have been taught in brief.

original: 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Dhāraṇī of the Inconceivable Praise of Qualities is complete.
